mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO `dic_qua_analysis` ( rel_id, joint_ailas, qua_level, create_by, create_time ) VALUES
(#{list.id},#{list.ailasId},#{list.jointAilas},#{list.quaLevel},#{list.createBy},#{list.createTime})
mapper.delete: delete from `dic_qua_analysis` where not create_by = 'system' and ailas_id = #{ailasId}
mapper.select:
SELECT id, rel_id AS relId, ailas_id as ailasId, joint_ailas as jointAilas, qua_level as quaLevel, create_by AS createBy FROM `dic_qua_analysis` WHERE 1 = 1
AND joint_ailas LIKE CONCAT('',#{jointAilas}, '')
AND qua_level LIKE CONCAT('',#{quaLevel}, '')
AND create_by = 'system'
AND NOT create_by = 'system'
order by create_time desc LIMIT #{start}, #{pageSize}

SELECT ifnull(count(1),0) FROM `dic_qua_analysis` WHERE 1 = 1
AND joint_ailas LIKE CONCAT('',#{jointAilas}, '')
AND qua_level LIKE CONCAT('',, '')
AND create_by = 'system'
AND NOT create_by = 'system'
